title: RAGE
description: After an asteroid impacts Earth, humanity attempts to rebuild. Sheltered in cryogenic lifeboats, survivors emerge years after impact to a devastated planet where some of mankind survived in struggling settlements or murderous bandit clans, while horrific mutants roam the dead cities. And a mysterious tyrannical government is on the huntâ€¦ for you.

childDownloads.title: Anarchy Edition
childDownloads.description: Turn the odds in your favor with access to these exclusive items: Double Barrel Shotgun, Fists of RAGE, Rat Rod Buggy and Crimson Elite Armor. This RAGE Add-on content is included in the Anarchy Edition. If you have purchased a new copy of RAGE Anarchy Edition, please do not purchase this content as you will be charged again.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - Jackal Canyon
childDownloads.description: Rumors has it that an Ark has emerged in Jackal Canyon, and a data decrypter may be found with it. Critical to helping The Resistance in their fight with The Authority, this could turn the tide of the battle. Getting through to the Ark won't be easy as the canyon is home to The Jackals, one of the Wasteland's most savage and animalistic clans.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - Launch TV Spot
childDownloads.description: After an asteroid impacts Earth, humanity attempts to rebuild. Sheltered in cryogenic lifeboats, survivors emerge years after impact to a devastated planet where some of mankind survived in struggling settlements or murderous bandit clans, while horrific mutants roam the dead cities. And a mysterious tyrannical government is on the hunt... for you

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Arsenal
childDownloads.description: The key to any great FPS is an assortment of unique and powerful weapons, something RAGE has in spades. Learn more about the gameâ€™s innovative arsenal of weapons and gadgets from the team at id Software, and get a sample of RAGEâ€™s innovative engineering system. The variety of ways in which you can take out your enemies makes RAGE a shooter unlike any youâ€™ve experienced before! This is the third installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Dawn
childDownloads.description: Go behind the scenes of RAGE to see where it all began. With insightful commentary from id Software team members, learn how the storyline of RAGE is inspired by some scientific truths and get to know more about the gameâ€™s key factions and their motivations in this unique post-apocalyptic world. This is the second installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Enemy
childDownloads.description: From mutants to bandits to the insidious Authority soldiers, RAGE features a unique cast of enemies armed to the teeth and gunning for you. Go behind the scenes with the team at id Software to learn more about the opponents youâ€™ll face, their unique fighting styles and personalities that keep the combat in RAGE fresh and challenging. This is the fifth installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Legacy of id
childDownloads.description: The team at id looks back at its twenty-year legacy as inventors of the first-person shooter and the innovators of the genreâ€™s key evolutionary advances. Hear id Software members reminisce on classic id shooters, and look toward the future with RAGE â€“ the next groundbreaking shooter from the inventors of the genre. This is the first installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Sound and Art
childDownloads.description: See how top-notch voice acting, brilliant sound effects and detailed environments come together and add another layer to an already immersive world in RAGE. The team responsible for RAGEâ€™s amazing sound and art design detail how these aspects help to draw you into a living, breathing world. This is the final installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Wasteland
childDownloads.description: Learn more about the world of RAGE, and how this unique Wasteland serves as a compelling backdrop for the game. Hear from the team at id Software on the various characters and environments that make up the Wasteland, and how it all ties together to deliver intense missions, multiplayer and co-op experiences. This is the fourth installment in a six-part series.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - The Well
childDownloads.description: The Ghost clan threatens to poison the water supply of Wellspring as a battle is waged underneath the cityâ€™s foundation.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - Uprising Trailer
childDownloads.description: After years of running and hiding, a small group of dedicated fighters has banded together to stand up. Finally, the Authority has something to fear.

childDownloads.title: RAGE Demo
childDownloads.description: Welcome to Wellspring, a small oasis of civilization in the Wasteland. The Ghost Clan, a cult of murderous fanatics, has infiltrated the waterworks beneath the town with plans to poison the water supply, and youâ€™re the only one with the weapons, talent and courage to stop them.  Also while in Wellspring you can meet the townsfolk, try your hand in games of skill and chance, peruse the wares of the local vendors or hit the Speedway for some white-knuckle racing.

childDownloads.title: The Scorchers
childDownloads.description: With a burning hatred that consumes all it touches, The Scorchers aim to eliminate all life though a sadistic plot to destroy the Wasteland. What they didnâ€™t count onâ€¦ a hero who fears nothing. Jump back into action with guns blazing and prepare to save humanity once again in RAGE: The Scorchers. With new allies, new weapons and new missions to conquer, youâ€™ll take on overwhelming odds to become the savior the Wasteland needs.

childDownloads.title: RAGE - Untethered Trailer
childDownloads.description: Rule the Wasteland in RAGE - from the Inventors of the FPS, id Software. Watch the Untethered trailer now!

childDownloads.title: Wasteland Sewer Missions
childDownloads.description: From under the dry, cracked surface of the Wasteland a foul stench seeps forth. Â A vast network of long abandoned sewers echo with the screams of horrified victims, and townsfolk are starting to talk. Word of mutants has spread like wildfire and now the settlers of the Wasteland fear for their lives. Are you ready to face the danger that lurks in the labyrinth of sewers? Many have tried, and their spoils lay waiting for a brave adventurer, like you, willing to risk life and limb for the promise of fame and fortune. But, beware; mutants of all shapes and sizes await you, ready to fight to your death. This RAGE Add-on content is included in all new copies of the game sold at retail. If you have purchased a new retail copy of RAGE, please do not purchase this content as you will be charged again.
